snippet: The selection of Mark E. Feldman, a former prosecutor best known for convicting top members of New York’s crime families, is Kenneth P. Thompson’s first major personnel announcement.
lead_paragraph: The selection of Mark E. Feldman, a former prosecutor best known for convicting top members of New York’s crime families, is Kenneth P. Thompson’s first major personnel announcement.
abstract: Incoming Brooklyn District Attorney Kenneth P Thompson makes his first major personnel announcement, selecting former prosecutor Mark E Feldman to serve as his chief assistant; Feldman is expected to play an important role in the review of dozens of homicide convictions investigated by Detective Louis Scarcella.

headline.main: Brooklyn District Attorney-Elect Chooses Top Assistant
